body.name: Epson Pro EX7280 3-Chip 3LCD WXGA Projector, 4,000 Lumens Color Brightness, 4,000 Lumens White Brightness, HDMI, Built-in Speaker, 16,000:1 Contrast Ratio
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 20 hrs 21 mins
features: Amazing brightness — 4,000 lumens of color and white brightness (1) ideal for displaying large-group presentations, spreadsheets and videos, even in well-lit rooms
Crisp image quality — WXGA resolution delivers crisp text and images; perfect for displaying professional-quality presentations, video and more

True 3-Chip 3LCD technology — displays 100% of the RGB color signal for every frame, providing outstanding color accuracy while maintaining excellent color brightness, without any distracting “rainbowing” or “color brightness” issues seen with other projection technologies
Versatile connectivity — features an HDMI port, so you can easily connect streaming devices, including Fire TV, Apple TV, Roku and Chromecast (2)
Get up and running in no time — with easy image adjustments and convenient control like 1.2x optical zoom, horizontal slider and auto vertical correction
Easy setup — built-in speaker for easy setup for video and audio right out of the box
Built-in picture skew sensor — automatically analyzes the picture and instantly corrects the vertical keystone to help square the image
Amazing dynamic contrast ratio up to 16,000:1 — provides crisp, rich detail for graphs, images and videos
Award-winning service and support — standard 1-year limited warranty, full-unit replacement, along with free technical phone support for the life of the product
body.description: Impress your audience and own the room with the ultra bright Pro EX7280 projector, offering 4,000 lumens of color and white brightness (1) to deliver crisp, detailed, professional-quality presentations, spreadsheets and videos – even in well-lit spaces. From home offices to video conference rooms, this sleek, compact projector makes it easy to display captivating, big-screen images in nearly any location, using advanced 3-chip 3LCD technology and stunning WXGA resolution. Perfect for creating dynamic, engaging presentations, the Pro EX7280 allows for easy Zoom video conferencing and conveniently connects to streaming devices, such as Fire TV, Apple TV®, Roku, and Chromecast™, through the HDMI® port so you can easily share a variety of rich content, including movies, TV shows and more (2). 1. Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15.4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118. 2. Requires wireless network connection of 5 Mbps or faster. Some apps require paid subscriptions. 3. Check for convenient and reasonable recycling options with us 4. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.

reviews.reviewText: Worth every penny,outstanding picture and sound from projector is great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I Have bought like 4 of theese lately, all working fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works very well in a partially lit room before it is actually dark out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2019
reviews.reviewText: So far I have no complaints about the projector. It meets my needs for sufficient brightness to be used in a well-lighted room, the color rendition is quite good, and it is very easy to set up. I do move it around some but don't actually travel with it so the fact it isn't the most compact unit in its class doesn't bother me. It is quiet in operation and doesn't overheat or even get uncomfortably warm; you can shut down and immediately slip it into its carrying case. I haven't yet used all the various input options but both HDMI and wireless connections are hassle-free. The little built-in speaker puts out adequate volume for small room presentations and sounds decent for narration. If you are reproducing music or a movie soundtrack you would want to use the line audio outputs feeding a better sound system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a quick replacement for an HD projector while I was buying a replacement bulb from a horrible company called "BulbAmerica" who doesn't back their replacement products. This does not quite have the resolution of my old projector, but it costs just a little more than a replacement bulb for it, so I am switching to this full-time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Tenía temor de comprar un proyector "refurbished". Fue un riesgo. Pero ahor estoy muy contento. Valio la pena. Es un gran proyector, aún siendo refurbished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I love my new project. It works great.

Bought it refurbished, but still runs great, picture is fantastic, and it throws while maintaining quality further than I'd ever need it to. Unit does have HDMI and VGA along with USB, built in WLAN for casting using the Epson app. Super bright, and vivid colors.Really like the physical horizontal keystone slider, it lets me keystone an image almost 30 degrees off center and still have a good projection.Fan does run a bit loud, but if on Eco mode it's tolerable.
